data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Tozeur.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tozeur, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Tozeur, Tunisia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary: On average, 21 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Tozeur, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 32 believers living in the state of Tozeur. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Tozeur.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Ghadames people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Ghadames people.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Tozeur that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Tozeur, Tunisia will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tozeur, Tunisia has a population of 107,900.

We estimate Tozeur has 32 people who might know Jesus, 452 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 107,416 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,371 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Tozeur, Tunisia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
